title: My phone was replaced once under warranty but the replacement phone is giving me issues during Calls
content: My phone was replaced once under warranty but the replacement phone is giving me issues during Call. The screen sleeps during the call and does not wake up and I cant make selections 1,2...etc if I need too. If I am trying to leave a message I cannot go back to the screen to make further selections or even end the call. Very very frustrating and I want the devise to be replaced. Pls help
